entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@RepAdamSchiff Why are you blaming Americans & a sitting US President for a virus made in #CommunistChina? #COVID19 made in #WuhanChina that caused death & destruction in the USA? 
Why are Democrats #AntiAmerican? Why do you continue to lie about the origins of this virus for #CCP?
